I am a weird, white, cis-het #linguist who loves all of the #animals, who has two #dogs now and has had lots of dogs over the years, and who really likes #linguistics and #languages. I work with an #IndigenousLanguage community in the US on developing #languageTech. I am learning to improve my #coding and I want to know everything about your languages and your #pets.
